nodes.text: This crystal was in the possession of a tribe of Jawas, who kept it in a box on their sandcrawler. A young Tusken Raider named Reirin was hired by a trader to steal it, in exchange for passage off Tatooine. The trader told Reirin that the crystal would be one of the colors blue, green or purple, and that the Jawas knew what it really was. When she found the crystal, Reirin felt an unusual connection with it and decided to keep it instead.

The crystal first appeared in the short story "Reirin" from the collection From a Certain Point of View. The description of the crystal and Reirin's seemingly spiritual connection with it heavily imply she came into possession of a kyber crystal. However, this is never confirmed in the story.
